title: #146: The Wheels Are Coming Off
description:
The bad news is that the world seems as if it is tearing apart at the seams because of an engineered disaster, financial mismanagement, media lies, a stolen election, and confusing agendas.

The good news is that the wheels seem to be coming off. The media is having a difficult time keeping track of their myriad lies, the people in positions of authority are turning on one another, and the cartoonish attempt to lure unsuspecting people into taking an experimental medical procedure is failing miserably.

We are at a crossroad where logic and reason are found down one path, while insanity and manipulated emotions are found down the other. Will humanity survive the onslaught brought forth by the Globalists trying to enslave the world, or will the people curl up into a ball and give up? Only time will tell.
